verses.name: Colossians 4:6
verses.text: Let your speech be alway with grace, seasoned with salt, that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man.

verses.name: Colossians 4:7
verses.text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you, who is a beloved brother, and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord:

verses.name: Colossians 4:8
verses.text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose, that he might know your estate, and comfort your hearts;

verses.name: Colossians 4:9
verses.text: With Onesimus, a faithful and beloved brother, who is one of you. They shall make known unto you all things which are done here.
